mapper.select: SELECT pu.u_id , pu.u_name ,pu.u_nickName,pu.u_headImage FROM playball_users pu LEFT JOIN playball_accept_appointment paa ON paa.aa_accept_subject_id= pu.u_id WHERE paa.ag_id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT pu.u_id , pt.t_name as u_name,pt.t_image as u_headImage FROM playball_team pt LEFT JOIN playball_accept_appointment paa ON paa.aa_accept_subject_id= pt.team_id WHERE paa.ag_id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
